In Orenburg, a man died in the fire (18+)

The fire report came to the MHS remote control today at 11:32.
23 January16:35video videoComments

In Orenburg province, the house of a large family of a deceased SVO member burned down.

The accident occurred in the morning of 19 January in the village of Dmitrievka Sakmar district. The mother and two younger brothers, Victor Matveyev, lived in the house on the street, who died heroically in Ukraine in March 2022.
23 January12:52video videoComments

In Orske, Toyota Camri hit a pedestrian.

The accident occurred on the eve of 22:25 opposite House No. 1 on Osinovsky Street.
23 January12:13Comments

Orenburg on the street. The driver of the SUV has tanned the lamp pole and has escaped.

U.S. officials are asking the non-traditional driver to contact them until 1700 today, otherwise the conversation will be quite different.
23 January12:06video videoComments

In Matveyev district, the pensioner was poisoned with charcoal gas

Fortunately, a 67-year-old man is alive.
23 January11:40Comments

In Orenburg, an accomplice in a group murder of 18 years ago will be tried (18+)

Three of the murderers were detained immediately, and the identity of the last long time was not established. He was detained only last November.
23 January10:27Comments

A resident of the Novoor region had written 16 migrants to his home.

None of them were gonna live with her. Criminal proceedings have been initiated. A woman may be deprived of her liberty for up to three years.
23 January10:13Comments

Eight people were rescued in the Light.

One of them is a child. The fire happened on Soviet street.
23 January09:49Comments

In Orenburg, the student will be responsible for arson of the entrance. Volgograd

Damage to household property exceeded 500,000 roubles.
23 January09:01video videoComments

Migrant tried to enter the Orenburg region on family documents.

All secrets have become clear, and now a man risks losing his liberty for up to four years.
22 January20:13Comments

A resident of Orenburg received four years of colony due to a police officer's visit.

The man didn't plead guilty.
22 January15:48Comments

He heard a sentence (18+)

According to the Book of Law, paedophile was at risk from 12 to 20 years.
22 January12:17Comments

In Orsk, a drunken mom beat up her daughter and tried to strangle her.

The mother received a fine and compulsory work as a punishment.
22 January11:27Comments

Four people were injured in an accident in the Belaya district

The road was not divided by Lada Kalina and WAZ-210740.
22 January10:48Comments

The resident of the Orenburg region was severely injured when the salute was launched (18+)

A man of 46 years. He's hospitalized with an open fracture of the lower jaw, smashed face and neck.
22 January10:13Comments

In the Quarken District, rescuers searched for a man with a broken snow

Fortunately, he wasn't hurt.
22 January09:25video videoComments

In Orenbourg, a policeman may be deprived of his liberty for seven years.

This happened in the middle of the day in October 2021, but the man still hasn't heard the verdict.
21 January08:20Comments

Investigators continue to investigate the death of a pregnant woman and her son in the Buzuluku hospital (18+)

Now, if there's a figure in a criminal case, the investigative authorities prefer to detract. It may not be possible that the charge is not yet presented to anyone two months later, and it is not known whether the perpetrators will be guilty in this history.
20 January19:46Comments

Two people died in the fire in Orenbourg.

The tragic fires took place in the Akbulac and Orenburg regions.
20 January11:01Comments

In Orenburg, an angry man hit a hammer on the neighbor's head for making noise.

A 40-year-old head trauma patient was reported by the police.

Cases

This section orenday is devotedAccidents, Tragedies, Disasters and Crimesrelevantin Orenburgand Orenburg.
We're following the accident reports and we're telling you the most.Importantand relevant ones.

Avia and car crashes, accidents

Transport events unfortunately occur in large quantitiesevery day♪ Orenday does not report a number of situations, such as " bats " on the road. Our task is to inform readers promptly of the events that need to be known.

11 FebruaryA plane collapsed in PodmoskovjeSaratov airlines with orchards on board. It was the Moskva Orsk flight.71 passengersand crew members are dead.

Landing accidentUrban Districttook seven lives.♪ 18-year-old Camille Kuvatov, like saving a guardian angel, losing her parents, she became a guardian of a younger sister.

Large scale

“Snow prisoners”In 2016, due to heavy metal in the snowOrenburg-OrskThere are dozens of cars. People who freeze in their cars waited more than 15 hours.

Crimes and penalties

We're tracking information on crimes and telling people who and for what he's done or he's gonna be punished, be it.gangs or killersof commissionedthe killing of entrepreneursin Orenburg

Of course, it's impossible to keep quiet about when the Ringers becomeGlobalMMM -Family Copier CooperativeI left hundreds of people without blood. By investing money on interest, many have copied for surgery, housing and other important needs.

Officials often have problems with the law. For example,criminal proceedingsnow former head of OrenburgEugenia ArapovaconvictedHead of Gennady Borisov♪TrialsThe Ministry of Education, the Ministry of Labour and Employment of the Orenburg Region, the Ministry of Agriculture of the Region, addressed them.

Search operations

We don't stay indifferent if the security forces or volunteers ask for help and help from the bandwidths.searching for people♪ Stillnot establishedlocationA serial maniac from Orsca Valeria Andreeva♪

Stay on all the news with me.Orenday♪

Use of materials

All rights to be published on orenday are protected under the law of the Russian Federation. Any use of materials is permitted only in agreement with the Editor, with a mandatory active reference to the source.

The editorial is not responsible for the validity of advertisements posted on the website orenday.ru, the website content of the hyperlinks and the comments. Comments to the publications are personal views of the website users.
